name: ED_IEV_EVENT_INFO_CONCEPT
description: This table stores information on concepts (HLV records) linked to certain lines.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the event record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EVENT_CONCEPTS_ID
columns.description: Stores HLV records corresponding to SDEs filed for this event.
